extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Level 2 or above and CISC121 and (CISC102 or MATH110).

basic.description: Elements of mathematical logic with computing applications. Formal proof systems for propositional and predicate logic. Interpretations, validity, and satisfiability. Introduction to soundness, completeness and decidability.
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Logic for Computing Science
